attributes.action: Set up a rescue fund to assist people having their homes repossessed due to the credit crunch
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the banks and other financial institutions are to be recipients of a rescue package it is only fair that the people who have been affected by their irresponsible lending practices should receive government aid to protect their homes from repossession. They are the real victims in all this mess created by the so-called professionals.
